statements: UPDATE transaction_records SET amount = 100.50 WHERE transaction_id = 1;
UPDATE transaction_records SET user_id = 100, status = 'Completed' WHERE transaction_id = 2;
UPDATE transaction_records SET amount = 500.50, status = 'completed' WHERE transaction_id = 100;
UPDATE transaction_records SET timestamp = '2022-01-15 10:30:00', amount = 750.25 WHERE user_id = 200 AND status = 'pending';
UPDATE transactions SET quantity = 10 WHERE transaction_id = 'a5e72e79-9f81-4da8-9bc0-eca0c38406b1';
UPDATE payments SET payment_date = '2023-11-28 15:30:00' WHERE user_id = 'b0e1bba8-2773-4cf4-a5e4-0a8222e3fc8a';
UPDATE transactions SET total_price = total_price + 20.50 WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE payments SET payment_date = NOW(), payment_amount = payment_amount + 100.00 WHERE user_id = 'aebc50e2-ae3c-4e27-bf3d-92d3d15e4fdb';
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 1000.50, transaction_date = '2022-10-01' WHERE transaction_id = 101;

UPDATE users SET phone_number = '+1234567890' WHERE user_id = 567;
